Detailed Description

AcacLanguage provides functionality for the TextPackConnector to access the data of a TextPack.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

INT32 AcacLanguage::GetIndexOf (  const WCHAR *  text  )  const
 

Returns the position for a given text. If the string is not found or the text parameter is NULL, -1 is returned.

Parameters:
text The text that should be searched.
Returns:
The index of the text given in the parameter text. -1 if the text is not found.
